definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Je 24:2 pot, jar (Aram. [[דּוּדָא]] duwdo0 perh. cf. Syr. dowed disturb, from the idea of boiling)—abs. [[דּוּד]] 1Sa 2:14 + 4 t.; pl. [[דּוּדִים]] 2Ki 10:7, [[דְּוַדִים]] 2Ch 35:13; pl. cstr. [[דּוּדָאֵי]] Je 24:1—

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: receptacle for carrying, all Vrss basket, 2Ki 10:7 (heads of king's sons), Je 24:2, Je 24:2 (figs) cf. [[דּוּדָאֵי]] Je 24:1, as if fr. a II. [[[דּוּדַי]]]; Ps 81:7 (clay or bricks, ‖[[סֵבֶל]]).
